entry.title: CTV vaults in the wild
entry.summary: In response to AJ's skepticism about the readiness of CTV for deployment on mainnet, James has created an implementation and write-up of a simple vault design using CTV. The implementation can be found on GitHub. James believes that this design has several attractive qualities for custody operations of any size. This effort is in line with the call for third-party experimentation in public by AJ.
